body.name: SouNor Matte Black One Piece Toilet Dual Flush 1/1.5 GPF Elongated U Shaped 17.3" Tall Bowl Comfortable For Seniors Elderly Modern 12" rough-in (SN1080BG)
features: 👍 [Matte black color] Nice modern design and black color to match your modern matte black bathroom series.
👍[Elongated U Shaped Toilet Bowl] The one piece toilet comes with bigger and wider U Shaped bowl for adding more space, more comfortable for sitting.

👍 [Faster and Powerful Flush] 3-inch dual flush valve for fast & quiet flushing.dual flush design, siphon flushing technology, fully glazed and bigger trap-way, bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - no clogs, no leaks, and no problem.

👍 [UF Heavy duty soft closing toilet seat included ] The toilet comes with the matte black toilet seat is made of heavy duty material,which is stronger than normal PP plastic seat cover, no yellow. It is very easy to clean and even look news after years. The toilet seat and lid are with soft closing feature, which makes it safe and quiet at night without disturbing the rest of the family

👍 [ High efficiency dual flush (1.0/1.6 GPF) ] Toilet with water efficient, low consumption dual flush technology, saving more water and your bill. According to the statistic ,thousands of gallons of water can be saved annually in a residential household that employs dual flush toilets.
👍 [ Tall Toilet Bowl] The high toilet bowl with seat is 17.3 inches, the chair right height feature provide a more comfortable experience to taller,older person or other people with mobility problems
👍[Gold button] The gold button is ship separately from the toilet, and the silver button on the toilet can be used as a backup.
👍 [12 Rough in toilet] Standard 12" Rough-in. Do not fit 10" rough-in. (The rough-in distance means the distance from wall to center of fixing bolts).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome to SouNor SouNor is committed to creating your exclusive bathroom space and only produces high-quality products.As a company that prioritizes high-end and high-quality products, we are committed to providing good service to our customers. If you are not satisfied with the product, we offer a free return and exchange service.

If you are not satisfied with the product, we offer a free return and exchange service.

SouNor SN1080BG Black One Piece Toilet with Lower tank and 17.3 inches Taller Bowl The black toilet with dual flush one piece toilet with 17.3 inches taller bowl with seat, the chair seat height feature provide a more comfortable experience to taller, older person or other people with mobility problems. Product size: Length: 27-inchWidth: 15-inchHeight:25-inchRough-in: standard 12-inchSeat Height: 17.3-inch

Powerful flushing with less water Siphonic action flushing system with small rim holes allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides (360 degrees), increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush.

More details 3-inch flush valve in the tank 3-inch flush valve for fast & quiet flushing. Siphon flushing technology, fully glazed trap-way, bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - no clogs, no leaks, and no problem. Gold button The gold-colored buttons are not only aesthetically pleasing and stylish, but also provide a high level of contrast that's easy to see at night. Full glazed trapway 2.5 inches fully glazed trapway that’s surely meant to flush away very bulky waste without clogging.It also reduces friction, staining and prevent clogging.

UF heavy duty soft closing toilet seat The toilet seat is made of UF heavy duty plastic, gives ceramic feels to touch ,not yellow or discolor, very easy to clean and keep news after many years use.Elongated U shaped toilet bowl shape adds extra sitting room for comfortable.Both seat cover & lid close quietly without slamming. No disturbance to family sleep. Black toilet seat with quick-release hinges for easier removal Only process the center button and lift up to remove the toilet seat, it makes the process of deep cleaning the toilet very easy. Easy to install Side holes opening for easier to fix the bolts

reviews.reviewerName: The faucet was a beautiful piece and was even more beautiful when you see it in person. "High quality and elegant piece."
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and the height is excellent for those of us who have a sore back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: even before using the seat broke. ceramic is OK but the seat is substandard and broke before even started to use. hard to find a replacement. lets see if the vendor sends replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest customer service ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful toilet that really saves on water usage. Was a little leery about purchasing a toilet online, but the customer service was excellent. I highly recommend this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean, but not comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I really love the look of this toilet, and how sleek it is. It did come with a missing piece and it was kind of hard to put together. You need really small hands to put the bolts in through the holes on the sides. Also, the seat is very uncomfortable sitting on. I do love how easy it is to clean though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the sleek modern style. All accents in the home we’re building are black. This goes perfect. Amazed that I found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits just right, I love it thank you and no leaks fits just right.
reviews.reviewText: Great quality made very well and does not leave stains at all beautiful finished and perfect we love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seat is HORRIBLE!
reviews.reviewText: I am LIVID about this toilet! The seat is cracked! The base is installed so returning is not an option. This is not acceptable for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DIY Bathroom REMODEL
